endpoints.description: Retrieve the current operational status and diagnostics of all registered equipment.
Create and schedule a new maintenance operation for a specified piece of equipment.
Fetch the maintenance logs and actions performed on a specific piece of equipment.
Cancel a previously scheduled maintenance operation by its unique identifier.
Update the information or operational parameters of a specific equipment.
Run predictive maintenance analysis and receive insights for future operations.
Register a new piece of equipment within the maintenance tracking system.
Remove an equipment entry from the tracking system by its unique identifier.
Retrieve the list of all active maintenance and status alerts.
Submit feedback or report issues concerning equipment management or maintenance processes.
